snippet: Montana wildlife commissioners on Monday shut down all wolf hunts and prohibited trapping in areas of the state that border the northwest corner of Yellowstone National Park.
abstract: Montana wildlife commissioners shut down all wolf hunts and prohibit trapping in areas of the state that border northwest corner of Yellowstone National Park; order comes after the eighth Yellowstone wolf wearing a tracking collar for research is killed this season.
lead_paragraph: Montana wildlife commissioners on Monday shut down all wolf hunts and prohibited trapping in areas of the state that border the northwest corner of Yellowstone National Park.

headline.seo: Montana: Wolf Hunts Are Banned in Areas Bordering Yellowstone
headline.main: Montana: Wolf Hunts Are Banned in Areas Bordering Yellowstone
headline.print_headline: Montana: Wolf Hunts Are Banned In Areas Bordering Yellowstone
